Package ohos.multimodalinput.standard

Class MultimodalEventHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.multimodalinput.standard.MultimodalEventHandle

  • public class MultimodalEventHandle
extends Object
    Provides methods for handling standard events, including registering and deregistering a standard event.
    Since:
    5
    See Also:
    StandardizedEventHandle
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.MultimodalInput#MULTIMODAL_INPUT

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int registerStandardizedEventHandle​(Ability ability, StandardizedEventHandle standardizedEventHandle)
      Registers a standard event.
      static int unregisterStandardizedEventHandle​(Ability ability, StandardizedEventHandle standardizedEventHandle)
      Deregisters a standard event.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • registerStandardizedEventHandle

        public static int registerStandardizedEventHandle​(Ability ability,
                                                  StandardizedEventHandle standardizedEventHandle)
        Registers a standard event.
        Parameters:
        ability - Indicates the object that creates the standard event.
        standardizedEventHandle - Indicates a standard event, which can be CommonEventHandle, KeyEventHandle, MediaEventHandle, SystemEventHandle, TelephoneEventHandle, or TouchEventHandle.
        Returns:
        the registration result, MultimodalErrorCode.MMI_STANDARD_EVENT_INVALID_PARAMETER, MultimodalErrorCode.MMI_STANDARD_EVENT_SUCCESS, or MultimodalErrorCode.MMI_STANDARD_EVENT_EXIST.
        Since:
        5

      • unregisterStandardizedEventHandle

        public static int unregisterStandardizedEventHandle​(Ability ability,
                                                    StandardizedEventHandle standardizedEventHandle)
        Deregisters a standard event.
        Parameters:
        ability - Indicates the object that creates the standard event.
        standardizedEventHandle - Indicates a standard event, which can be CommonEventHandle, KeyEventHandle, MediaEventHandle, SystemEventHandle, TelephoneEventHandle, or TouchEventHandle.
        Returns:
        the deregistration result, MultimodalErrorCode.MMI_STANDARD_EVENT_INVALID_PARAMETER, MultimodalErrorCode.MMI_STANDARD_EVENT_SUCCESS, or MultimodalErrorCode.MMI_STANDARD_EVENT_NOT_EXIST.
        Since:
        5
